Next generation Digital Banking

Take your financial life online. Your Easybank account will be a one-shop for spending, saving, bugeting, investing, and mush more.

Why Choose Easybank ?

We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your finacial hub.

control your fainances like never before

Onlinle Banking

Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

Simple Budgetion

See exatly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you're close yo hitting your limits.

Fast Onboarding

We don't do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finaces right away.

Open API

Mange your savings, investments, pesion, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier
